Articles.Content:
So I've been scoping out the new parts, and have noticed there's a whole set of tapered fuel tank adapters to transition between the various form factors.  Great!  Except, unless I'm missing something, there's no tank for going from 2.5m to 3.75m  WHY???????   This was a part that should have been in original KSP, and now we get just about every possible variation except this one?  

Somebody out there must really be a fan of the ADTP-2-3...

8 hours ago, Aegolius13 said:

Great!  Except, unless I'm missing something, there's no tank for going from 2.5m to 3.75m  WHY???????   This was a part that should have been in original KSP, and now we get just about every possible variation except this one? 

Yeah, I felt the same way myself. 

So, I modded one in.  Here's one for ya!

Or, if you just want this one part, don't want to install the whole mod, and happen to have ModuleManager installed, you can just download this .cfg file and drop it anywhere in your GameData folder.

Enjoy! 

(Caveat to anyone else reading this:  you have to have Making History installed for this to work, since this part's a rescale of an existing MH part, which you won't have if you don't own the expansion.)
Awesome,  thanks!  Old part packs are now probably pretty redundant with the new stuff,  so this fits the bill perfectly.
